page.title: 08LUNAN AREA DEMOGRAPHY
page.content: This is a thinly populated area of approximately 100 persons. The age range is from toddlers to octogenarians. There are families with young children and teenagers as well as middle aged and senior citizens. SOCIAL CLASS. There is a mix of social classes. MEDICAL SERVICES There are no doctors surgeries in this area. The nearest are in Arbroath or Montrose. The nearest district nurse is stationed at Inverkeilor. POLICE This area is policed by mobile patrol vans from Arbroath and Montrose. LOCAL GOVERNMENT. This area is served by Angus District Authority. Up to the Lunan Hotel is served from Arbroath and north of this line from Montrose.
